changes: Server is currently in development. Stay tuned for updates!
New freelance jobs added: Bus Driver, Forklift Operator, Garbage Collector, Diving Job, Taxi Driver.
Pillbox Hospital and LSPD HQ MLOs added for immersive roleplay.
Inventory system upgraded to OX_Target for better performance and cleaner UI.
First robbery script added: 7/11 store robbery now live!
Fueling system upgraded to ox_fuel for smoother vehicle interaction.
Thirdeye system converted to ox_target for reliable interaction zones.
Modern banking script implemented with advanced ATM support and wire transfers.
Advanced housing system added: furniture placement, stash creation, police raids, and realtor role.
Dynamic gangs and advanced economy mechanics in progress.
Planned release for full public access soon!
